name: SoccerScores
0:
”Alexa, ask Soccer Scores what is the Arsenal score?”
”Alexa, ask Soccer Scores what are the Serie A scores?”
”Alexa, ask Soccer Scores who do Liverpool play next?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soccer scores
des:
Find out the latest score or next fixture of your favourite soccer team.

Teams supported from the:
English Premier League
English Championship
English League One
English League Two
English National League
Scottish Premiership
Scottish Championship
Scottish League One
Scottish League Two
Brazilian Serie A
Dutch Eredivisie
French Ligue 1
French Ligue 2
German 1. Bundesliga
German 2. Bundesliga
German DFB-Pokal Cup
Spanish La Liga Primera Division
Italian Serie A
Italian Serie B
Portuguese Primeira Liga
Champions League
FIFA World Cup

You can also ask for scores from the following leagues as well (but not individual teams):
Scottish Highland League
Scottish Lowland League
League of Ireland Premier Division

Works with live and finished games.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
